title: Tata Power to target 20% share in PM Surya Ghar Muft Bijli Yojana: CEO
description: "The expectation is that in the next 4-5 years, about 25-30 GW of capacity will be added. We are looking to cover about 20% of this but it will be over five years. It will be flat in the initial years but possibly from the second or third year, we will see much more capacity getting added."
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
